content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the kaunas district court the court made a final decision regarding the division of matrimonial property between the applicant and the defendant the applicant was awarded a peugeot car half of the garage a portion of the land plot and a portion of the dwelling house the defendant was awarded a renault and audi cars half of the garage a portion of the land plot and a portion of the residential house both parties will have joint financial obligations the text discusses various articles from the civil code related to the termination of a matrimonial community property the court also made decisions regarding the dissolution of the marriage custody of their underage daughter maintenance payments and access to the daughter the court upheld parts of the amended application and counterclaim and dismissed the remainder the court ordered the payment of costs and deferred the decision on stamp duty
